snippet.title: Apartment No.9 Otome Jam 2021 Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Help Leah find happiness or lead her to ruin in this dark slice-of-life story about a teacher whose life is turned upside down when the homeless guy she often stares at out of her window shows up at her door, claiming to have found her purse.

https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/apartment-no9

Apartment No.9 is a game I made for Otome Jam 2021. It is based on a script from the anthology series 'Inside No.9'.

Features:
 *Original sprites, CGs, & soundtrack
 *Fully voice acted
 *New game+ featuring extended & new endings
 *13 different endings depending on your choices
 *Casual choices & choices with consequences
 *2 love interests
 *CG gallery & other unlockables

The Team:
Writer/Creator/OST - Melancholy Marionette - @Marionette_Mask - 
UI & Sprite Artist - maneki-mushi - maneki-mushi.itch.io
CG Artists - sophrossynes & LazyCrocodile - @sophrossynes@MrsLaziness0
Additional Character Concepts - Desichan - https://desichan.itch.io/
Beta Reader - Lilal - Lilal#1888

The Cast:
Leah - Anonymous
Akuji - rongvoice - @rongvoice - rongvoice.carrd.co
Doyle - Lars van den Haspel/LarsVoices - https://www.castingcall.club/m/LarsVoices
Fleur - Megan "The Fangirl" Gotham - @The_Fanily - https://www.castingcall.club/m/SayHaloGoodbye
Male Doctor - rodas1e
Female Doctor - CloudyDecember - https://www.castingcall.club/m/CloudyDecember
Steve - Timothy Smith

The song playing is the vocal version of the game's main theme. 

Otome Jam 2021 logo by Foleso.

Some of the overlays I used in this video came from Videezy.com.
